## Conference Organization

```{r conf-org}
# links in html tables:
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35078430/including-links-within-rmarkdown-tables-pdf

conf_org_urls <- "https://brainhack-dallas.github.io/mini-brainhack-utd/"
conf_org <- 
  data.frame(
  Year = c("2019"),
  Conference = c(paste0("[BrainHack Dallas](", conf_org_urls, ")")),
  Location = c("Dallas, TX")
  )

kable(conf_org) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c('striped', 'hover', 'responsive'))
```
